data.md:MetaData: Occurence data for the non-indigenous jellyfish species Blackfordia virginica in NW Europe from 2010-2017
First record of the non-indigenous jellyfish Blackfordia virginica (Mayer, 1910) in the Baltic Sea
Positions, sampling times and occurence data for the non-indigenous jellyfish species Blackfordia virginica in NW Europe.
